pages.title: Kamen Rider Thousand Ark
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Genms -Smart Brain and the 1000% Crisis- (2022, TTFC special)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:zero_one/devices/ark_driver_zero_thousand_ark)Ark Driver-Zero (Thousand Ark)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed II$(li)Resistance II$(li)Jump Boost II$(li)Strength III
